meanings.definition: Experienced in the imagination through the feelings or actions of another person.
meanings.sent1: She felt a vicarious thrill watching her friend skydive.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed a vicarious adventure through the pages of his favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to take vicarious pleasure in watching the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: Her vicarious fear of heights made her palms sweat as she watched the movie.
meanings.sent5: The virtual reality game provided a vicarious experience of space exploration.
